name: blue.
description: blue. is the part puzzle game, part visual novel, story of a young cubie growing up in a colorful mined out world of gems. Play as Violet through their adolescence, meet their friends and family and learn about the Cubie world. And most of all learn when it takes to succeed in this underground place.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 110 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 110 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
